welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kirkby, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful countryside. We invite you to explore and soak in its warmth and beauty during your stay here. Enjoy your time in Kirkby!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines at Liverpool John Lennon Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The terminal for domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal, mainly used by low-cost airlines.
